title: Wall of Stone
tags: how to acquire wall of stone
content:
Wall of Stone Level 5 Evocation Spell Raise a wall of non-magical, solid stone. 18m Concentration Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Evocation Spell

Raise a wall of non-magical, solid stone.

18m Concentration

Wall of Stone is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Wall of Stone is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
